sentences.en: " We would like very much to have you for dinner, " as the cannibal said to the captured missionary.
sentences.cn: 嗜食人肉的人对被俘掳的传教士说: “ 我们想设宴招待你(吃掉你) ”.

sentences.en: A missionary came to your church, His pictures made you cry.
sentences.cn: 一位宣教士来到了你的教会, 他放的照片让你感动落泪.

sentences.en: At supper he was silent and ill - at - ease, but the missionary was jovial and animated.
sentences.cn: 晚饭时,他一声不吭,坐立不安, 但是传教士却兴高采烈、有说有笑.

sentences.en: He shuddered a little as he looked at the missionary.
sentences.cn: 他看着传教士,不禁有点心惊胆颤.

sentences.en: He spent 20 years in Korea as a missionary.
sentences.cn: 他在韩国当宣教士有二十年之久.

sentences.en: His missionary journeys laid the foundations of Christianity in the Empire.
sentences.cn: 他传教的历程在帝国铺下了基督教的基础.

sentences.en: I heard you sing at that school for missionary kids in Tokyo.
sentences.cn: 我是在东京那所传教士孩子的学校听到你演唱的.

sentences.en: I repeat I freely consent to go with you as your fellow - missionary.
sentences.cn: 我再说一遍,我爽爽快快地同意跟你去,作为你的传教士的同事.

sentences.en: My mother would still like me to be a missionary in Africa.
sentences.cn: 我母亲还是想让我在非洲做一名传教士。

sentences.en: She taught in a missionary school for a couple of years.
sentences.cn: 她在一所教会学校教了两年书.

sentences.en: That orphan was sent to a missionary school for education.
sentences.cn: 那个孤儿被送到一所教会学校上学.

sentences.en: The French missionary was intrigued by the stories he heard about these peculiar deer.
sentences.cn: 有关这种怪鹿的种种传说,使得这个法国传教士着了迷.

sentences.en: The Missionary offered an uncertain smile.
sentences.cn: 女教士报以迷惘的一笑.

sentences.en: The missionary sprang to his feet and strode across the room.
sentences.cn: 传教士跳了起来,在房间里大步踱来踱去.

sentences.en: The two missionary sisters have received their missionary crosses from the archbishop.
sentences.cn: 那两位传教士姊妹已经接受了大主教授予她们的教会十字架.

sentences.en: Unquestionably his missionary work between 1940 and 1942 had much to do with eventual success.
sentences.cn: 毫无问题是,他在一九四○年至一九四二年间的传道式工作与那次决定性的成功有很大关系.

phrases.tran_cn: 传教士式体位（指男上女下的性交姿势）

trans.tran_en: relating to the work of missionaries
someone who has been sent to a foreign country to teach people about Christianity and persuade them to become Christians
someone who has been sent to a foreign country to teach people about Christianity and persuade them to become Christians
